@graph.name: Sweet Tooth and Sass
@graph.description: A blog about all my baking endeavors!

@graph.name: Skyrim Sweet Rolls - Sweet Tooth and Sass
@graph.description: Moist Skyrim sweet rolls drizzled with white icing. A lovely little dessert inspired by the The Elder scrolls video game.

@graph.name: Skyrim sweet rolls
@graph.description: Moist sweet rolls drizzled in a white icing just like in the game!

itemListElement.text: Preheat oven to 350°. Grease a mini bundt pan with non-stick spray and set aside.
itemListElement.name: Preheat oven to 350°. Grease a mini bundt pan with non-stick spray and set aside.

itemListElement.text: In a bowl of a stand-mixer fitted with a paddle attachment, cream together the butter and sugar for 5 minutes until super light and fluffy.
itemListElement.name: In a bowl of a stand-mixer fitted with a paddle attachment, cream together the butter and sugar for 5 minutes until super light and fluffy.

itemListElement.text: Add in one egg at a time, beating well after each addition. Scraping the sides of the bowl as needed. Add in the heavy cream and mix until blended.
itemListElement.name: Add in one egg at a time, beating well after each addition. Scraping the sides of the bowl as needed. Add in the heavy cream and mix until blended.

itemListElement.text: Add in the flour, salt, baking powder, and vanilla extract and gently mix on low until just combined.
itemListElement.name: Add in the flour, salt, baking powder, and vanilla extract and gently mix on low until just combined.

itemListElement.text: Pour batter into greased mini bundt pan and bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown around the bottom edges. Allow to cool for 5 minutes and then transfer to a cooking rack to complete cooling.
itemListElement.name: Pour batter into greased mini bundt pan and bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown around the bottom edges. Allow to cool for 5 minutes and then transfer to a cooking rack to complete cooling.

itemListElement.text: Melt the butter in a microwavable bowl and add in the milk. Slowly, mix in the confectioner's sugar and vanilla. Drizzle over cooled sweet rolls and enjoy!
itemListElement.name: Melt the butter in a microwavable bowl and add in the milk. Slowly, mix in the confectioner's sugar and vanilla. Drizzle over cooled sweet rolls and enjoy!
